I got the Valve Complete Pack the summer sale that I got my steam account, I spent a ton of time in beating Half-Life 1 and...

This game was a total let down in my book.

The first one was so much better than this one is. 

This one is just Meh to me.

Can I explain my feelings? Nope, but this one is just not good. I liked 1 so much more than this one.

Just play Half-Life 1 for the rest of your life imagining that a sequel just like it exists... Don't play this one, just imagine that a Half-Life similar to the first exists and just... Wish and Hope a Half-Life similar to the first one does in fact Exist... 

Are you hearing me?

Imagine it and just get away from this game.

And here we are. I spoke of my return to this shore. It has been a circuitous path to lands I once knew, and surprising to see how much the terrain has changed. Enough time has passed that few remember me, or what I was saying when last I spoke, or what precisely we hoped to accomplish. At this point, the resistance will have failed or succeeded, no thanks to me. Old friends have been silenced, or fallen by the wayside. I no longer know or recognize most members of the research team, though I believe the spirit of rebellion still persists. I expect you know better than I the appropriate course of action, and I leave you to it. Except no further correspondence from me regarding these matters; this is my final episode.

Half Life is dead... Still the greatest franchise in history... 

Its strange that people say that the ep3 would never live up to expectations... lets just say "i find their lack of faith disturbing". People used to say that about HL2 after they got hacked and had to rebuild the original game almost from scratch... Look at HL2

Also with portal 2 and Left 4 Dead 2 "they are just trying to milk the cow" and what not... Look at Portal 2 and Left 4 dead 2

Without a single doubt in my mind HL2:ep3 would be an amazing game.

Read somewhere it was because of Mass Effect 3 reaction, valve got scared over the hype... But its jsut such a different situation was so different, that game (ME3) was made by a different studio even, and lied on its pormisses... You really think that would happen with valve?

No. HL2:ep3 would be amazing just like every Valve game

On one hand I love Half Life, every single game has kept me on the edge of my seat and I think the simplicity makes the story that much more incredible. On the other hand though, Valve took artistic integrity and threw it in the trash. People are pissed off and heartbroken for a reason. I hope Artifact crashes and burns.

Одно из бессметрных тварений с отличной физикой, графикой и сюжетом. Игра пройдена уже нена один раз и периодически к ней возаращаюсь. В сценарии бродилки, етрудные логические задачки, езда на баги и катере, стрельба тяжелего, легкого и стационарного вооружения. Из "табельного" оружия как тривиальные пистолеты-автоматы, так и весьма необычные, но эффективные гравипушка или феромоны, ну и, конечно же, какой Гордон Фримен без красной монтировки.

Nějakou dobu před tím, než vyšel HL2 (dejme tomu max. 2 roky), jsem slýchal o jisté hře jménem Half-Life, která měla být přelomová, skvělá apod. Bylo to v době, kdy jsem se teprve k internetu prokousával, což je v dnešní době věc prakticky nemyslitelná, ne-li nepředstavitelná. 
Každopádně jsem byl na HL zvědavý. 
Nicméně první díl, který se mi z této série dostal do rukou, byla právě dvojka. 
Měl jsem už něco odehráno, ale to, co se mi dostalo od HL2, na to jsem tak nějak nebyl připravený. Krásná grafika ve skvělé optimalizaci mi na mém, tehdy obstarožním, PC nedělala problémy. Atmosféra a takový ten feeling povědomosti města a všeobecně krajiny umožnil rychlé ztotožnění se s hrou. Uvěřitelná NPC a kousaví nepřátelé to ještě umocnili. Perfektní průchod hororovým Ravenholmem, dodnes se mi ježí chlupy při tom pomyšlení. Sem tam humorné odlehčení. A když to dáme všechno dohromady? To byla prostě symfonie. 
Dnes už je pro mnohé hráče mnohé z toho mnou zmíněného pryč. A pro ty, kdo by HL2 zkusili až dnes, už asi nepůjde o nic než mírně nadprůměrnou střílečku. Já si však dodnes užívám každé chvíle v kůži Gordona Freemana, toho nemluvného hrdiny. 
Je snad jen škoda, že krom dvou standalone datadisků se už nejspíše do světa HL nepodíváme. Jde totiž o jedny z nejlepších výletů, které mohou hry nabídnout. 10/10

Sere claro...
Hace poco el escritor de la saga Half Life, Marc Laidlaw, revelo en modo carta lo podria llegar a ser Half Life 3 y lo que revelo respectivamente fue su final...
Es una lastima para todos que Valve se haya ido por ''el dinero facil''  con juegos como CSGO y Dota 2 generando grandes cantidades de dinero de las que ellos generaron al momento de lanzar Half Life.
Ya que, si se ponen a pensar, a Gabe no le sirve lanzar HL3 devido que ya genera MUCHO dinero con esos juegos..
Porque gastaria el dinero en un juego que al fin y al cabo, ademas de generar BASTANTE dinero como dije anteriormente...No se sabe que pensara la comunidad del mismo...ya que para que un juego ''dure 10 largos años'' debe de ser un juego...BUFF...que reviente todas las expectativas del publico...
Y eso como numero 1
Numero 2 
El en una entrevista le preguntaron sobre HL3 y no respondio esta vez lo tipico de : We dont have anything to say about Half Life 
Mas bien....dijo que actualmente habia que enfocarse en lo que la comunidad tiene la vista puesta actualmente (CSGO y Dota 2)
Yo la verdad, ignore todo lo que dijera que Half Life 3 no iba a salir pero con esta noticia que salio de Marc Laidlaw sobre HL3, pongo muy en duda ahora la salida de este juego...
Esto es lo que actualmente esta matando la industria de los videojuegos ,el dinero, y podemos ver que Valve ya esta siendo afectada por ello...

     2004-2007

Бессмертная классика которую должен пройти каждый. Этот шедевр вышел в 2004 году, для того времени физика и графика была на высшем уровне, сюжет тоже интересен. 
Плюсы игры:
1. Интересный сюжет
2. Разнообразный геймплей
3. Прекрасный движок
4. Музыкальное сопровождение на высшем уровне.
Единственное что может не радовать - это затянутость, ну уж сильно как по мне затянута игра, после прохождение Шоссе-17 игра становится скучновата, возращение в те места, бесконечные убийства "Страйдеров". Даже не смотря на это игра так и остаётся шедевром, и играется прекрасно даже сегодня.
UPD: Прочитавши "Raising The Bar", а также "1984", ХЛ открывается с совсем другой стороны.
Халф-Лайф ещё будет жить и жить...

make Half life 3 not some card games

You want Half-Life 3? Then do this:

- Don't pay for microtransactions in any game like TF2, CS:GO or Dota 2

- Don't buy Steam Trading Cards

- If you want, don't sell your cards either

- Actually, don't buy or sell anything from the Community Market

- If you want an item from a game, use the original trading and not the market

- Don't craft badges with the trading cards

- Don't buy games on Steam just for the trading cards

- Buy Half-Life games

This game is absolutely amazing. Even though it's over 10 years old, the graphics still hold up today, and the story may be the best I've seen in a video game. It is absolutely worth checking out, and I still hope that we'll get HL2:E3 or HL3 eventually. The HL community is still going strong after almost 20 years, and with the "Epistle 3" story published, the fans are even more eager for a new installment. I wrote this review just to show Valve that people still care about this series, and especially this game in particular. There's a very small chance that anyone at Valve will ever see this, and that's ok. I only ask the fans of this game to keep supporting it, and to keep telling Valve what they want. One thing that I absolutely do not understand is all of the new reviews giving HL2 thumbs down claiming "This is for HL3". What does that really accomplish? We won't get another Half Life if we give it's best title bad reviews. If you want to hate on Dota 2 or Artifact for "killing" the HL franchise, then please go over there. Half Life 2 is a great game, maybe my favorite game of all time. I hope we'll see a new game eventually, but until then, all we can do is wait, and enjoy the great experiences we already have. Half Life 3 confirmed? I hope so.

The fans have been crying out for a sequel and we instead got some shitty DotA card game.
